noSystemChangeMsg: >> No System Status Change in the last 5 minutes
hardCommandConfirm: . Change will not take effect until the start of volume scan. Do you want to continue?
softCommandConfirm: Are you sure you want to change

controlRPG.SHUTDOWN: You are about to stop all of the RPG processes.
SUB: You are about to restart all of the RPG processes.

MRPG_STARTUP.MRPG_ST_STANDBY: Contents of datastores will be preserved.
MRPG_STARTUP.MRPG_ST_SHUTDOWN: Contents of some datastores will be reinitialized.
MRPG_STARTUP.MRPG_ST_OPERATING: Contents of datastores will be preserved.
MRPG_STARTUP.FAIL: RPG Startup only valid in Standby, Shutdown, and Operate states.

MRPG_CLEANUP.SUCESS: Using this Clean Startup option will empty the contents of ALL datastores and then restart all of the RPG processes.
MRPG_CLEANUP.FAIL: RPG Clean Startup only valid in Standby, Shutdown, and Operate states.

defaults.defModeA: Default VCP for Mode A to
defaults.defModeB: Default VCP for Mode B to

SAILSDialog: Selecting "0" cuts will disable SAILS. All non-zero numbers are additional scans of the lowest elevation beyond any already defined in the VCP
